valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 27 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 28 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Sole 958 expected 200 miles west of Rockall 962 by 0600 tomorrow. New low expected northeast Trafalgar 983 by same time

Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.

In southwest, wintry showers. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good.
